MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15am to make a permanent repair to a faulty section of underground cable close to the Clarendon Crescent Substation  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.58am on the 5th of April 2021.
